title: Three Men in a Boat
description: This a previously-published edition of ISBN 9780140621334"We agree that we are overworked, and need a rest - A week on the rolling deep? - George suggests the river -"And with the co-operation of several hampers of food and a covered boat, the three men (not forgetting the dog) set out on a hilarious voyage of mishaps up the Thames. When not falling in the river and getting lost in Hampton Court Maze, Jerome K. Jerome finds time to express his ideas on the world around - many of which have acquired a deeper fascination since the day at the end of the 19th century when this excursion was so lightly undertaken.
author: Jerome K. Jerome
